content.title: Volt MX App
content.body:
1. Connect your mobile device to your computer using a USB cable.
    For an Android mobile device, ensure that the USB is set as Transfer files.
    For an iOS mobile device, ensure that trust has been established between the device and the computer.
  2. Launch your Volt MX App on your mobile device.
  3. Select the USB tab.
    On a successful connection, Iris on your computer shows a success prompt.
